scripts.cover: nyc --reporter text --reporter cobertura --reporter html --reporter=lcov --lines 66 mocha --timeout 120000  --exit --unhandled-rejections=strict tests/*.test.js
scripts.ci-test: echo linux ci-test&& nyc --reporter text --reporter cobertura --reporter html --reporter=lcov --lines 66 mocha --timeout 120000  --exit --unhandled-rejections=strict tests/*.test.js
